dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: THAT ONE WAS A CLOSE ONE!!!

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: You see that stuff that popped out of the enemy when you beat him?

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: That was PAINT, you can collect that to fill up your paint meter.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: And when he died, some GEAR dropped from him! Robots love that stuff, so make sure you get it whenever you can!

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: GEARs can come from enemies and can be hiding in a ton of other places.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Make sure to keep your eyes peeled for anywhere they could be hiding. (˵ •̀ ᴗ - ˵ ) ✧ WINK WINK
